about_item:

product_info.Special Features: Frameless Design, Google TV with Android 14, LED, Micro dimming, Mali G31 MP2, Open GL ES3.2, IFSE, 178° Wide Viewing Angle, Personalised Content Suggestion, ARC, High Fidelity Speakers, Super Brightness, HDR10, Dolby Audio, Integrated Bluetooth V2.1/3.0/4.0/4.1/4.2/5.0/5.2, Video Calling, Eye Care protect, Shell body
product_info.Mounting Hardware: 1 LED TV, 2 Table Stand Base, 1 User Manual, 1 Warranty Card, 1 Remote Control,1 Power Cord, 2 AAA Battery
product_info.Remote Control Description: One Click Prime, Netflix, Youtube | Google Assistant | With Voice Assitant

review_summary: Customers find the television offers good value for money with its clear picture and sound quality. They appreciate the easy installation and features, though opinions differ on functionality and lag.
